attributes.action: Stop funding schools, hospitals & roads of other EU countries and use MY TAX MONEY on British schools, hospitals and roads instead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make it Law that NO BRITISH GOVERNMENT duly elected by the British Public can use British Tax Payers money to subsidise the infrastructure of other EU countries.
The British Tax Payers money must be put to good use in our own country to fund run down schools, hospitals and transport systems.

rejection.details: there are lots of anti-EU petitions on the site already
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
